description:
Audit found exported symbols whose only consumers are their own tests. Two categories:

## Remove outright (zero production callers)

- **issue.PriorityIcon** (status.go:34) — created during ANSI cleanup, never adopted. Delete function and test.
- **treefs.RefName** (treefs.go:748) — method on *TreeFS, zero callers anywhere in project.
- **treefs.FileInfo.Size** (treefs.go:38) — Size() method, field is populated but method never called.
- **Args.IntErr** (cmd/bw/helpers.go:154) — richer variant of Args.Int(), no command uses it. Delete method and test.
- **Args.PosJoined** (cmd/bw/helpers.go:184) — joins positional args, no command uses it. Delete method and test.

## Unexport (used internally, exported only as test seam)

- **repo.ValidatePrefix** (repo.go:73) — called by Init/ForceReinit internally. Exported only so external test package repo_test can call it. Unexport to validatePrefix; move or adjust test.
- **repo.BranchName** (repo.go:18) — const used only within repo.go. Unexport to branchName.
- **repo.Migration** (repo.go migrate.go:11) — type used only in Migrations slice declaration. External code reads .Description from slice elements but never names the type. Unexport to migration.
- **treefs.Open** (treefs.go:56) — 26 test calls, zero production calls (production uses OpenFromRepo). Tests are package treefs so unexport works directly.
- **intent.ParseIntent** (intent.go:248) — used internally by replayOne. Exported only for intent_test (external package). Unexport to parseIntent; adjust test.
- **intent.ExtractQuoted** (intent.go:274) — used internally by replayCreate/replayComment. Exported only for intent_test. Unexport to extractQuoted; adjust test.
title: Remove dead code: test-only symbols with no production callers
